mapper.select: select shid, id, rrid, shcontent, likecnt, commentcnt, eximgfilename, shregdate from sharings where id = #{id} ORDER BY shregdate DESC
select chid, id, chtype, chcontent, chcount, chdate from coinhistory where id = #{id} ORDER BY chid DESC
select id, password, pwquestion, pwanswer, rankpoint, (SELECT count(*)+1 from members where rankpoint > t.rankpoint) AS Rank From members As t ORDER BY rankpoint desc limit 5

select id, password, pwquestion, pwanswer, rankpoint, rank from( select id, password, pwquestion, pwanswer, rankpoint, @vRank := @vRank + 1 AS rank from members AS p, (SELECT @vRank := 0) AS r ORDER BY rankpoint desc ) AS cnt where rank between #{rank}-2 and #{rank}+2
